speaker: Edward Un
title: Improving customer experiences with Speech to Text and Text to Speech | AI Show
description:
In this episode of the AI Show, Edward Un is back and he's joined by Heiko Rahmel to talk about what's new in Speech to Text and Text to Speech (https://aka.ms/AIShow/CognitiveSpeechServices) Landing the core scenarios for Speech service including speech transcription for call centers, text to speech for content creation, read-out functionality, and chatbots. Check it out!
